Add as friend Send Msg Top Dog freshfunk5 November 28, 2006 5.0 5.0 star rating +6 0 +6 6 Votes Top Dog is top notch!
Top Dog is a fine establishment with the usual characters being the smoked-out college kids, late-night nerds, the crazy guy with a wild eye and random asian girls in their pajamas.
In college, Top Dog was THE place to go to after a night of drinking and frat partying. Nothing killed a crave like a Top Dog. (Smothered in your choice of sauerkraut, relish, onions, ketchup, all sorts of foreign mustards, etc.)
Nowadays, Top Dog is THE place to go to after a night of binge drinking and pub crawling. Kidding. But it’s open late and is the perfect late night snack. They have a wide assortment of sausages/dogs to choose from. Be on your toes when they take your order and when you pay. They run a tight ship.

I love the hot dogs at Top Dog. But the downsides are too much. No only is a hot dog really expensive, but they are small portions and do not fill you up at all. You have to get at least a couple to fulfill hunger at all. The types of hot dogs they are have are neat and all taste great though. The place smells great too. Link To Review
